clipboard.notSupport: [{name}] Your browser does not support clipboard operations.
clipboard.readDataError: Please paste an IMAGE, not an image FILE.

setting.imageCDNTip: Please disable if images don't load
setting.clearLocalStorageTip: Will clear all inputs and settings
setting.clearCacheStorageTip: Will clear all static resources cache
setting.clearIndexedDBTip: Will clear the Tesseract language training data and depot material recognition data cached in the keyval-store database of IndexedDB

setting.showGuarantees: Show all combinations with 4★ or higher

tip.rare: Please set time to 9:00 to secure your tags
tip.robot: Please set time to below 3:50 to obtain @:tag.28

table.selectTip: Please click the button on the bottom right corner to select tags.

ocr.tip: You can also drag & drop image here or paste your screenshot directly
ocr.tagOverLimit: Too many tags detected. Only the first {n} tags will be used.
ocr.tagNotEnough: The number of recognized tags is fewer than {n}, please complete it.
ocr.loadingConfirm: Need to load {size} language training data, do you want to continue?

setting.localOCRTip: After enable, Tesseract will be used for local OCR. For the first use, you need to load a total of about 10-30 MB of runtime and language training data. Subsequent use will no longer use your network traffic, and can be used offline.
setting.tip: This function uses the free OCR service provided by {0}, and uses the official trial API key by default. If you have reached the trial limit due to high usage frequency, please {1} to apply for a free API key.

sync.cloudSyncReadme: When the sync code is empty, clicking "Backup" will generate a sync code and backup the current preset, inputs and planner stage selections to the server. Enter the sync code on other devices to restore the data.
sync.apiKeyReadme: The API Key is not required, but if the API call reaches the limit, please go to ExtendsClass to register an account and fill in the API Key here. Each API Key can only read or modify the data corresponding to the sync code created by the API Key.
sync.localBackupReadme: This is a legacy backup method which can be used for local temporary backup. Backup code must be saved in order to restore your data.
sync.autoSyncUploadTip: Auto Upload: Backup to cloud upon input (and every 5s). Your data won't be restored automatically for security reasons, please click the button manually to restore them.

plannerSetting.title: Planner Settings
plannerSetting.excludedStageNumber: No stage has been excluded | {n} stage has been excluded | {n} stages have been excluded

snackbar.importFailed: Import failed, please check your code.
snackbar.syncCodeInvalid: Sync code is invalid, please delete it and regenerate one.
snackbar.penguinDataFailed: Update failed, please check your connection.

todos.tips: Tips: Click the to-do items to mark it as completed, and at the same time, the corresponding materials will be automatically deducted and the preset data will be modified. Click items which can not be completed will highlight related materials.

input.title:
Click here or
Drap & drop image here or
Paste screenshot here

result.tip: Tip: Click the recognition results to filter or modify results.

sw.cached: Content has been cached for offline use.

a2hs.title: @:common.a2hs
explains: You can add this toolbox to homescreen and use if offline, but images can only be displayed offline after being cached once.
If you are launching this page for the first time, you may need to wait until all resources are cached before adding this page to homescreen.

guide.title: How to add to homescreen
guide.windows: Click the {0} button on the top right of browser, then click {1}.
guide.ios: Visit this site with Safari, then click the share button {0} at the bottom of the browser and click {1}.

texts: Supports all servers, you can change it in the settings below.
If you are willing to help us to translate or improve the translation, please read the README on GitHub, thanks.
Welcome to submit {0}s or pull requests if you have good ideas, suggestions, or if you found a bug. You can also start a discussion {1}.
Am I helpful? Don't forget to recommend me to other Doctors!
Settings and inputs will be saved automatically.
In {0} on the material, the number in brackets is the number that can be synthesized.
Click the {0} button near the name of the material to simulate a synthesis.
Click the stages listed on the right of each material to see the drop stats in detail.
{0} means that the material will be used both raw and for synthesis.

Use {0} to calculate the material demand of specified operator(s). Adding a new preset will discard the {1} inputs. You can edit a preset by clicking its label. All presets will be cleared if you click {2} or {3}.

{0} is a function to compute the optimal farming stategy using linear programming. The farming strategy is for reference purposes only. Rarity filter restricts the materials below this rarity from being synthesized. The data used here is from {1}.

warning.noLocalStorage: ⚠️ LocalStorage is not enabled in the current WebView environment. Settings and input data will not be saved.
